comment: A reminder that and respect each other more than you respect half your friends , and , while friends do sometimes fight , they know , as you should , that oligarchy is the disease we all have to focus on , and democracy the cure .
amr:

                        :ARG0 (e / each
                              :mod (o / other)
                              :ARG1-of r2))
                  :op2 (r3 / respect-01
                        :ARG0 e
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (y / you)
                                    :ARG2 (f / friend))
                              :ARG1-of (h2 / have-quant-91
                                    :ARG3 (m / more)
                                    :ARG4 (r4 / respect-01
                                          :ARG0 y
                                          :ARG1 (p2 / person
                                                :ARG0-of (h3 / have-rel-role-91
                                                      :ARG1 y
                                                      :ARG2 (f2 / friend)))))))))
      :op2 (k / know-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / person

                        :ARG1 y

            :ARG1 (a3 / and

                        :domain (o2 / oligarchy)
                        :ARG2-of (f4 / focus-01
                              :ARG0 (w / we
                                    :mod (a4 / all))
                              :ARG2-of (o3 / obligate-01
                                    :ARG1 w)))
                  :op2 (c / cure-01
                        :ARG2 o2))
            :time (f5 / fight-01
                  :ARG0 p3
                  :frequency (s / sometimes))
            :ARG1-of (r5 / recommend-01
                  :ARG2 y)))

comment: I m not suggesting the issues between them are trivial . But I am suggesting , having witnessed something of both of their orbits , that these are two people , and campaigns , who admire each other and who grasp that their real enemy is not each other but plutocracy .
amr:

      :snt1 (s / suggest-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (t / trivial
